job.title: Full Stack Developer C#/Vue/TypeScript/Tailwind/Postgresql
job.description:
Compensation: Salary + Equity

Are you a talented developer with a passion for groundbreaking projects? InstantResume is currently in its pre-launch phase and is actively seeking a Lead Developer to play a pivotal role in bringing our innovative platform to life. What sets us apart is our proven track record, as we already operate a thriving Job Board and organize Virtual Hiring events for over 2000 companies in eight different countries. With our extensive network and reach, we anticipate driving more than 2 million job seekers to our resume site every month once it's fully developed.

About InstantResume:

InstantResume is on a mission to redefine the way job seekers create resumes and apply for positions. Our AI-driven platform empowers individuals by providing them with the tools and insights needed to stand out in a competitive job market. We believe that every person deserves a professionally crafted resume tailored to their unique skills and ambitions.

Your Role as a Lead Developer:

As a Lead Developer at InstantResume, you will be at the forefront of our project's development. You'll collaborate with two other junior developers to turn our vision into reality. Whether you're seeking a full-time or part-time commitment, your motivation and belief in the project is what truly matter to us.

Compensation:

We offer a unique compensation structure where the selected developer will receive a monthly payout based on their equity share in the company's profits. For instance, if the company generates $500,000 in monthly profits and you hold a 20% equity share, you can expect to receive $100,000 as your share of the profits each month.

Why Join InstantResume:

- Be part of an exciting pre-launch project with enormous growth potential.

- Work alongside a dedicated and innovative team.

- Enjoy a flexible work arrangement, whether you prefer full-time or part-time.

- Receive both a competitive salary and earn equity in the company.

- Leverage our successful track record in the Job Board and Virtual Hiring event space.

What We Offer:

- The chance to shape the future of resume creation and job applications.

- A collaborative and dynamic work environment, even in a remote setting.

- A direct financial stake in the project's success through equity ownership.

- The opportunity to work on a project with the potential to impact millions of job seekers worldwide.

- The flexibility to choose between full-time and part-time commitment options.

If you're a motivated and talented developer looking to make a significant impact while shaping the future of resume writing, we invite you to join InstantResume on this exciting journey. To express your interest in becoming a Lead Developer and Equity Partner, please send your resume and a brief cover letter detailing your experience and enthusiasm for this opportunity.

Come be a part of our mission to revolutionize the job search experience. Apply today!

questions.question: How many years of work experience do you have with ASP.NET?
How many years of work experience do you have with C#?
How many years of work experience do you have with WebRTC?
How many years of work experience do you have with Tailwind CSS?
How many years of work experience do you have with Typescript?
